summary: Just a simple re-texture of the dragon skeleton made to be a bit more bloody, as if the flesh was \"freshly\" removed.
descriptionHtml:
I personally felt that the dragons\' bones seemed way too clean after being killed. It only seems logical that some gore would be left over.

This is just a simple re-texture done with Photoshop.

This texture DOES affect all dragon skulls and skeletons throughout Skyrim.

As I am not a modder, I do not know how to apply this texture only to killed dragons.

If any modders know how to do so, feel free to alter the file.

Install manually to your Skyrim folder where your \"Data\" file is located.

I\'m in no way, shape or form a modder. This was a personal preference of mine and I thought I\'d share it with those who may have the same preference as I do.

Thanks. :)
author: voodoohammer
